user_story: As a Doctor, I want to access patient information through a web-based Clinician Portal, so that I can efficiently review patient data and modify information in the database.

acceptance_criteria.given: I am a Doctor logged into the Clinician Portal.
acceptance_criteria.when: I navigate to a patient's record.
acceptance_criteria.then: I should be able to view and modify the patient's information in the database.

acceptance_criteria.given: I am a Doctor using the Clinician Portal.
acceptance_criteria.when: I am interacting with the portal.
acceptance_criteria.then: The interface should be easy to learn and navigate quickly.

non_functional: The Clinician Portal must be a web-based application.
The Clinician Portal must comply with HIPAA regulations.
The Clinician Portal must comply with FDA 21 CFR Part 11 regulations.

citations.snippet: 4.1.1.Clinician Portal As a web­based application, will be the primary channel through which users access or modify any information in the database. Shall rely on common web­application standards, specifically AJAX and require users to access through a browser. The interface must be easy to learn and navigate quickly.

.

Software Requirements Specification for Day Health Manager Version 1.1 Prepared by 4yourhealth Senior Project 2015
2/10/2015

epic: Digitize Patient Records and Automate Tracking
user_story: As a Day Health Staff, I want to digitize patient assessments, care plans, and sign-in/out sheets so that I can improve the current physical workflow and automate patient tracking.

acceptance_criteria.given: I am a Day Health Staff member
acceptance_criteria.then: I can scan and store patient assessments, care plans, and sign-in/out sheets digitally.

acceptance_criteria.given: Patient assessments, care plans, and sign-in/out sheets are digitized
acceptance_criteria.when: a patient signs in or out
acceptance_criteria.then: the system automatically tracks the patient's status.

non_functional: The system must comply with HIPAA regulations.
The system must comply with FDA 21 CFR Part 11 regulations.

citations.snippet:
1.Introduction
1.1.Purpose The Trillium Health Day Health Manager is a system primarily used to assist Day Health staff in the tracking and care of patients in their Day Health program by multiple means.

epic: Replace Trillium's current system with a new system including database, clinician portal, and session application.
user_story: As a Doctor, I want to view patient data stored in the system so that I can effectively review patient information and provide appropriate care.

acceptance_criteria.given: I am logged into the clinician portal as a Doctor.
acceptance_criteria.when: I select a patient from the patient list.
acceptance_criteria.then: I can view all relevant patient data, including scanned documents, basic info, and session data.

non_functional: The system must comply with HIPAA regulations.
The system must comply with FDA 21 CFR Part 11 regulations.

citations.snippet: The scope for this project includes everything Trillium needs to replace their current system with our system in addition to a couple of extra features.
The patients section will be where the user can add, modify, or check any patient data stored in the system.
A clinician portal is required to present and organize the contents of the database.

user_story: As a Doctor, I want to view audit history reports per patient so that I can track changes to patient data and ensure data integrity.

acceptance_criteria.given: I am logged in as a Doctor.
acceptance_criteria.when: I navigate to a patient's record.
acceptance_criteria.then: I can view a report showing the audit history for that patient, including additions, changes, and deletions of documents and data.

non_functional: The audit history must be compliant with HIPAA and FDA 21 CFR Part 11.
The system must support auditing of documents and other data.

citations.snippet: 2.3.3.15.­ Reports which show auditing history, per user or per patient.
2.3.3.13.­ Allowing and Tracking changes to existing documents or data

user_story: As a Day Health staff member, I want to digitize patient assessments and care plans, so that I can automate tracking of individuals through the program and improve the current physical workflow.

acceptance_criteria.given: I am a Day Health staff member using the Trillium Health Day Health Manager system.
acceptance_criteria.when: I access the system to manage patient care.
acceptance_criteria.then: I should be able to create and store digital versions of patient assessments and care plans.

acceptance_criteria.given: Digital patient assessments and care plans are stored in the system.
acceptance_criteria.when: A patient signs in or out of the Day Health program.
acceptance_criteria.then: The system should automatically track the patient's attendance.

citations.snippet: The Trillium Health Day Health Manager is a system primarily used to assist Day Health staff in the tracking and care of patients in their Day Health program by multiple means.
An important assistive activity the system provides is to digitize what are currently physical artifacts such as patient assessments, care plans, and patient sign in/outs.
As an improvement to the current physical workflow, the system will automate tracking of individuals through the program.

user_story: As a Day Health staff, I want to digitize patient assessments and care plans, so that I can automate tracking of individuals through the program.

acceptance_criteria.given: I am a Day Health staff member.
acceptance_criteria.when: I access the Trillium Health Day Health Manager system.
acceptance_criteria.then: I can create and store patient assessments and care plans digitally.

citations.snippet: The Trillium Health Day Health Manager is a system primarily used to assist Day Health staff in the tracking and care of patients in their Day Health program by multiple means.
An important assistive activity the system provides is to digitize what are currently physical artifacts such as patient assessments, care plans, and patient sign in/outs.
As an improvement to the current physical workflow, the system will automate tracking of individuals through the program.

user_story: As a Doctor, I want to access patient data through the Clinician Portal so that I can review patient information efficiently.

acceptance_criteria.given: I am a Doctor using the Clinician Portal.
acceptance_criteria.when: I log in to the system.
acceptance_criteria.then: I should be able to view patient data stored in the database.

citations.snippet: database, the Clinician Portal, and the session application.
The scope primarily consists of three parts, the database, the clinician portal, and the session application.

user_story: As a Doctor, I want to add a new scanned document to a patient, so that I can have all relevant patient information stored in the system.

acceptance_criteria.given: I am logged in as a Doctor and have selected a patient.
acceptance_criteria.then: The document is stored in the patient's record and is accessible for review.

non_functional: The system must be HIPAA compliant.
The system must be FDA 21 CFR Part 11 compliant.

citations.snippet: user can add, modify, or check any patient data stored in the system. This includes basic functionality such as adding a new patient, adding a new scanned document to a patient, or checking on a patient’s basic info.

epic: Digitize patient records and improve workflow efficiency.
user_story: As a Doctor, I want to access patient assessments and care plans electronically so that I can review patient information more efficiently and provide better care.

acceptance_criteria.given: I am logged into the clinician portal.
acceptance_criteria.when: I search for and select a patient.
acceptance_criteria.then: I can view the patient's digitized assessments and care plans.

non_functional: The system must comply with HIPAA regulations.
The system must comply with FDA 21 CFR Part 11 regulations.

citations.snippet: The Trillium Health Day Health Manager is a system primarily used to assist Day Health staff in the tracking and care of patients in their Day Health program by multiple means.
A clinician portal is required to present and organize the contents of the database.

user_story: As a Doctor, I want to view patient data in the clinician portal so that I can efficiently review patient information and make informed decisions.

acceptance_criteria.given: I am logged into the clinician portal as a Doctor.
acceptance_criteria.when: I select a patient from the patient list.
acceptance_criteria.then: I can view the patient's relevant clinical information and documents stored in the database.

dependencies: Database setup for storing patient data
non_functional: The clinician portal must be HIPAA compliant.
The system must be secure to protect patient data.

citations.snippet: A clinician portal is required to present and organize the contents of the database. This is the
Database Currently Trillium health uses largely paper forms and sharepoint to manage their patients care.
